column5: Pretty kool, but if it starts to tip he better jump far far away from that big ole blade spinning inches behind him
Yes, Lew......a blade guard is definitely in order.  Regards, Snowball
I saw that on Facebook yesterday.  I think my prostate would fall out if I took a ride in that rig...!
Just skip the "smitty sled". Add  a sheet of UHMW to the hull bottom and go, that way you could technically run some open water...
